related_questions.question: Do people still use infographics?
related_questions.snippet: Infographics remain a valuable form of content. ... The infographic game has evolved in recent years, though. People are still visually motivated. Research shows that visuals help with memory retention, and that people tend to remember images better than text.Jun 14, 2018
